hevs.gdx2d.lib.renderers

Class ShaderRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.lib.renderers.ShaderRenderer

  • public class ShaderRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders things using a GLSL shader program included in a file.

    TODO The interface is rather basic as of now but should be improved in a future version.

    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry

      • render

        public void render(int posX,
                   int posY,
                   float time)
        Renders the shaders
        Parameters:
        posX - Center, x-position of the texture shader to draw
        posY - Center, y-position of the texture shader to draw
        time - The time information to pass to the shader
